text: I koly My uklaly iz vamy zavit ta pidnesly nad vamy horu [Sinay]: «Mitsno trymaytesya toho, shcho daruvaly My vam!» — to skazaly vy: «Slukhayemo ta ne pidkoryayemosya!» Cherez nevirʺya u yikhnikh sertsyakh zʺyavylasya lyubov do telʹtsya. Skazhy: «Nedobre te, shcho nakazuye vam taka vira vasha, yakshcho vy ye viruyuchymy
